summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5510 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, Renton's Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue and 17th Avenue, from East Pike Street to 17th Avenue; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70504, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
